div.span: Payson Hicks signs football intent letter with WNMU
The SHS Science Olympiad Team won 1st place at regionals held in Silver City. They move on to state competition in February!

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h1.div: SCSD Website has moved to www.socorroschools.org

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-wNfPc pSzOP-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: SCSD Vision Statement - Our students will be prepared and motivated to enter the ever-changing world as socially responsible and productive global citizens.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OwsYgb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: SCSD Mission Statement - To create a positive learning climate that ensures the success of every student, it is our mission to:

ul.li: provide rigorous and relevant curriculum delivered by highly qualified staff
promote and celebrate student diversity as a strength in our community
involve our community in the educational process
provide relevant co-curricular and extra-curricular activities
